name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Michael NEISHELL

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Michael NEISHELL.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Ernest D. Preate, Dist. Atty., Paul J. Walker Asst. Dist. Atty., Michael Basista, Scranton, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
525 A.2d 1203
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Michael NEISHELL.
No. 149 E.D. Appeal Dkt. 1984.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 21, 1986.
Decided May 22, 1987.
Ernest D. Preate, Dist. Atty., Paul J. Walker Asst. Dist. Atty., Michael Basista, Scranton, for appellant.
Charles Witaconis, Scranton, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
